description: Try our easy to follow Gluten Free Choc Chip Cookies recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Choc chip cookie,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Wheat free,Gluten free,Vegetarian,Egg free,Sesame free
name: Gluten Free Choc Chip Cookies Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1.5 cups white wings gluten free plain flour

recipeInstructions.text: Line 2 oven trays with baking paper.
Mix coconut oil, water, CSR Brown Sugar, CSR syrup and vanilla together. Add White Wings Gluten Free Plain Flour, baking powder, coconut, ground almonds and chocolate chips. Mix until well combined.
Roll tablespoons of cookie dough into balls, flatten slightly with your palm and place on prepared trays. Bake for 12 minutes. Remove trays from oven and allow to cool.
